website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight and portable sleeper that offers extra features like vibrations for a soothing effect.
pros: Soft but has a sturdy frame, and it gets top marks for the mesh sides that give good visibility and airflow
Easy to fold and large enough to accommodate babies a bit longer than some of the other products on the market
cons: Does not work well on uneven surfaces
Mattress doesn't have a firm enough bottom

customer_reviews.title: ... actually put on top of the bed and Im glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a cosleeper that you can actually put on top of the bed and Im glad I bought this. My daughter outgrew her old cosleeper and this is now perfect for her. She is about 26 inches long and there is still about 7 inches space for her (my estimate). She also loves the vibrating feature. It puts her right back to sleep. The mattress is more like an egg shape rather than an oval so when i remove the mattress cover, i sometimes end up putting it the wrong way making the mattress lift up a bit but all in all its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: margo s

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product and works great for my new born
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product and works great for my new born. I feel extremely safe when my baby sleeps next to my wife and I. The features are cool and it's super great and convenient to travel and store anywhere in the house .
customer_reviews.author: OzzyP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the quality of this product, but my wife didn't like it so that was that. I will say that if you're in a queen bed it better be one person or two small people, and then this sleeper should be either against the wall or between you. i could imagine bumping it off otherwise. Nevertheless that is a problem with all similar products and this one does the job well and I liked not having to get up at night, while also knowing that I wasn't going to roll over my new baby.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeper but not for us
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't love about this sleeper were the tall walls. My baby wants to sleep in your arms and the transition into this sleeper just didn't work for us. Every time I lifted hi up to put him in the sleeper he woke up and the rocking routine to get back to sleep had to start over. If the sides collapsed so you could just slide him over and in, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This bed/co-sleeper worked well for what I was looking for. I think my daughter was a bit too big/wiggly to start with, but we made it work. My only complaint is that the included pad is very crinkly. I had to fold one of her blankets around it and put a crib sheet over to secure it to help with the sound and add a little comfort. I didn't really use the light or vibration features at all but it's nice that they're an option. I did love how it can fold and travel easily. I brought it with me to work every day for two months with no hassle or issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and well constructed. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes this sleeper. It has good space for our infant and seems like will continue to offer good space until kid is 6 months old atleast. Music (2 modes) and night lite are good add-one. Specially the light as, we don't need to turn on the room light to check on the little one in the night. Construction material and the mesh is soft enough. The top rim (other than the middle section) is hard enough to offer resistance to an errant weight that may be placed by mistake. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: This co sleeper is perfect for what we needed. It is big but not too bulky for the bed. The mattress is soft and comfortable. My 6 week old loves the vibrating option and the music. I love that it easily folds so you can take it with you anywhere you go. This is a must have for your newborn especially if they do not like sleeping in their crib. I wish I would have bought it right away as my daughter sleeps so well in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ness. E

customer_reviews.title: Item is soft and comfy and great for cosleeping
customer_reviews.text: Item is soft and comfy and great for cosleeping. However if you don't have a queen size bed or bigger this is not the item for you. I have a full size bed and with the hubby and I plus this giant cosleeper there just isn't room in the bed. Item also has a list of hazards down the line of ways babies actually died from this item so I was shocked at how many were on the list. But item works for when baby is fussy and needs a cat nap with her mommy. It serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I didn't use this thing nearly as much as I thought I would. I wanted to be able to reach over and place the pacifier back in my babies mouth when he started being a fuss butt but the side walls are really too high to do that comfortably. You still have to sit up which kind of defeats the purpose of having the baby right next to you in bed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: icypoopsicle

customer_reviews.title: mattress fits perfect. cover removes for washing
customer_reviews.text: safe for my premie, with enough growing room that my 18month old laid down in it. mattress fits perfect. cover removes for washing. folds up easily with room inside to pack most of baby's things. I can lay arm across middle area to touch / pat the baby without having to sit up in bed. sides are firmly supported and tall enough so there's no chance of rolling over on it. Mesh is easy to see through. Vibrating option works well for my baby. it does make the
customer_reviews.author: it's me

customer_reviews.title: great find...just wished our daughter would have loved it!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this for our newborn expecting her to sleep in it. It is a decent product, but wish we would have been able to make it prop at an incline for her to sleep in it. She just couldn't stand the flat surface. We loved the sheet options and it was very cozy and comfy. It folded up to nothing which was awesome. We used it in our king size bed for a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Works great and live the little sound machine it comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use inside of our UV protectant tent at the beach and outside. Works great and live the little sound machine it comes with to help block out the other noise going on. My daughter sleeps in it like a champ, easy to use and take anywhere. Perfect for what my family needs it for especially since this is our 3rd child and we are always on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this sleeper and so does my three-month-old
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sleeper and so does my three-month-old. She usually sleeps super well in it. It's soft for her & not heavy for me to lug around. I actually bought it to bring on a long trip. I was able to put it in my suitcase for our flight. I stuffed a lot of baby clothes inside it & although it took up a lot of my suitcase, using the inside of it for storage made it worth it. I only wish it came with a handle & storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 3 month old with plenty of room to spare! She’s about 14 lbs. the matress is very comfortable for her and soft to the touch. Not too soft to where it’s dangerous. The mesh sides allow me to see her and has good airflow and breathablity. It has an attachment on one end that vibrates, has music and lights up. We use it as a co-sleeper. Don’t buy the brica one. She was able to throw her legs over the flimsy sides and work her way out of it!
customer_reviews.author: LeeTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a decent sized place to put the kid but ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a decent sized place to put the kid but the whole unit is floppy, there is no support between the two cages, so if you knock the bottom it will go sideways and the top will stay, putting your baby in an awkward position and causing mild stress upon seeing the baby in the unnatural baby position... I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built! The cushion in the bassinet was actually softer than the beds we slept on our vacation! The light was a bit bright and it seemed very sturdy along with being very roomy for our 7 month old. We did not take it on vacation too. As planned because we had not room for it though. Overall I think it’s a great product
customer_reviews.author: miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this when our son was an infant, put it in the middle of our bed for safer co sleeping! He was a really tall baby so this was the longest one I could find! The light and songs we didn’t really use, will save it for the next one!
customer_reviews.author: brittie124

customer_reviews.title: I like this in bed version of a bassinet instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: It served it's purpose, I like this in bed version of a bassinet instead of next to the bed where I had to lean over & check on baby, with this you can easily just check on baby, & hear baby sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for cosleeping until 7 months or so
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for cosleeping until 7 months or so, then baby became too long. The vibration was great to assist in keeping baby asleep.
customer_reviews.author: SRM

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Awesome bassinete
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back so being able to have my daughter sleeping next to me helps immensely for those four am feedings. Its very big though so be warned it takes up almost half of my queen sized bed but its so worth it for the peace of mind that I'm not gonna accidentally roll over and cover her with a pillow or blanket. Would definitely recommend for anyone that wants the convenience of sleeping right next to your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I used this sleeper since my baby was born up to 7 months, used in bed as co-sleeper, used it in the living room, to keep baby safe. It's the biggest I could find, I recommend to all my pregnant friends, but is hard to find now. Glad I was lucky to have it!
customer_reviews.author: XoMtz

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Like the mesh sides so we're able to sleep knowing our baby is fine if he wiggles to the sides. What I hate is the mattress. Oh my goodness it is so flimsy I can't stand it. Everytime my baby moves you hear it. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: honeybadger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LoVe <3
customer_reviews.text: My son has so much more room now, he outgrew his other co-sleeper. He is 24 inches long and he still has a lot of room =)
customer_reviews.author: Ammorin08

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I really like this infant sleeper
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really like this infant sleeper. It's a decent size and has zero assembly which makes it convenient. Easy to take on trips or to friends houses for the day. Great product and we would recommend this to other new parents looking for an easy sleeping solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its worthless!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of money for us. We had back to back babies and neither of our kids ever slept in this. There are much better products out there that will work better for the price. I dont recommend it. Also your kids will outgrow it fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We used this for our newborn before he became active ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our newborn before he became active enough to require a traditional crib. This was much easier to access (easier on the back) compared to a crib.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walbridge

customer_reviews.title: Not really useful for airplane travel
customer_reviews.text: It's bulky. Not really useful for airplane travel. Returned for the brica fold n go travel bassinet. It also didn't feel very sturdy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Pharmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.  Fits our 3 month old with plenty of room to grow!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! I think it is my most favorite baby item. Our son has acid reflux and we weren't getting any sleep, so this was a lifesaver having him with us instead of having to get up an down 100x a night. The only thing I wish it had was a handle or an easier way to carry it when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Desch

customer_reviews.title: Works well in our king sized bed. We have ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well in our king sized bed. We have a very firm foam type mattress so there's no sinking or bouncing, and a very low platform bed. Baby sleeps well in it, but at 13lbs & over 22 inches and one month, I don't see it lasting much longer. Vibration functions & light/noises are more trouble than they're worth imho. Very bright light, loud vibrating. Mattress took some time to flatten out with the fitted sheets. Overall though, it's been much easier for me than a traditional bassinet was with our first.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver! Saves so many trips back & forth between rooms & keeps your baby safe in your bed! The vibration & music not only helps out your baby to sleep but it knocked me out too! I would recommend this to everyone in the world if i could!
customer_reviews.author: Breaunna

customer_reviews.title: This is a great baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great baby shower gift! We received it for ours and loved it! Our daughter slept in it for the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too big for a queen size bed. You’ll have no room.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My little angel can sleep right next to me! The night light as the prefect amount of light not to disturb her slumber or my husbands... lol
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Jost

customer_reviews.title: And I love the confidence in knowing he's next to me in ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson (who just needs to sleep snug under me). He LOVES his infant sleeper. And I love the confidence in knowing he's next to me in bed.. but safe at the same time. Thank you Serta !
customer_reviews.author: Maxx L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Comfy and portable since it folds up
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Comfy and portable since it folds up. Little flimsy in the middle bc it folds up so you can't move it once you sit the baby in it
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: It works fairly good, the blue light from the keys is blinding ...
customer_reviews.text: It works fairly good, the blue light from the keys is blinding in the middle of the night. The bed is a little too firm as well. The vibrating part works good and the lights would work well but the blue light from the keys will blind you in the middle of the night. All in all though it works good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthy investment
customer_reviews.text: It’s been great for safe cosleeping as new parents. It definitely gets you used to giving the baby plenty of space and was great for night feeds while healing from a c-section. We also plan on using it to help transition to the crib eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie’s Mama

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for the first few months but my baby outgrew it quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Leosmom09

customer_reviews.title: To be honest I haven't even used this because my ...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I haven't even used this because my daughter co sleeps but as far as getting what I paid for it is what I expected!
customer_reviews.author: savanah hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this co sleeper our baby sleeps really well in ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this co sleeper our baby sleeps really well in it , he mattress is soft and the bed is lightweight. Only down side is it doesn’t have a handle or come with a case to make traveling with it easier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for travelling in town or out of town
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for travelling in town or out of town. If we're at a get together we can use this to securely lay the baby down for a nap.
customer_reviews.author: chilippr77

customer_reviews.title: It works great perfect for new born and still using it bby ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great perfect for new born and still using it bby is noe 4 months and still has a lot of space to go.
customer_reviews.author: Heydi Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall. A little disappointed with the music. It only plays one song and the Adium quality isn’t too good.
customer_reviews.author: carlos nava

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Search no more. Thia is the one you need. It is the biggest that I was able to find in the market. I used it for 6 months and my baby slept so comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for a king size bed
customer_reviews.text: It's a life saver! My baby now sleeps well and only wakes up to feed. Best for a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and can fold up easy for travel
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and can fold up easy for travel. The light on it is worth paying a little extra for compared to other co sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for a co-sleeping, if you have a king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Loane B.

customer_reviews.title: Best baby item purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This allows me to bedshare with my infant without risking safety!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Saroka

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my daughter for a baby shower gift. She absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very convenient. use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: very convenient. use it all the time. wish the there were more than 2 songs
customer_reviews.author: Margo B Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Very well made and great size. It is the biggest sleeper I could find and I was still surprised with how big it is. It folds and unfolds easily, I can set it up and close it one handed. The walls are very sturdy but the mesh walls let you keep an eye on your baby. My little girl is 19 inches and she fits with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! How did we ever live without this? Perfect for traveling and naps!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her first baby. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Duby

customer_reviews.title: The mattress is nice inside, but does not have a protective cover
customer_reviews.text: There's plenty of room for our 27in long seven month old child. The mattress is nice inside, but does not have a protective cover. The middle of the outside framing is loose/flexible, which makes collapsing for travel easy, and still holds up when the sleeper is open and flat for the baby. However, I wish there was a way to have the mesh sides in the middle section become rigid like the ends are. The nightlight is very bright. Overall, it works well for our little one, though.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P.

customer_reviews.title: I decided to purchase this bassinet and I'm soo glad I did
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't want our son sleeping with us because he was afraid of us rolling on him or hurting him. I decided to purchase this bassinet and I'm soo glad I did. It amazing! It's long and wide, we have a king size bed so we fit perfectly. The quality of it great.
customer_reviews.author: jenny garcia

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer doesn't make it clear that this is not made for sleeping on a soft surface like parents' bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking bottom portion that baby sleeps on was firm but it's actually quite flimsy. Manufacturer doesn't make it clear that this is not made for sleeping on a soft surface like parents' bed. In order for baby to sleep safely it should be on a firm surface otherwise it bulges and bows quite a bit. Sides of napper are secure and firm with nice mesh to prevent suffocation. Sides are also sufficient to protect against adults rolling over onto baby. Folds and stores quite easily. Just not comfortable with softness of base. Not sure if I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: TDC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We originally weren't going to co-sleep but I ended up with a c-section. This allows us to get some sleep without fear of rolling on top of our little one
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try it for my second and I absolutely love it! It's portable so he can sleep anywhere ...
customer_reviews.text: I never had this for my first son. I decided to try it for my second and I absolutely love it! It's portable so he can sleep anywhere I am. There is no set up involved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good co sleeper for a king bed
customer_reviews.text: The co sleeper did what was expected, but I felt like our queen bed wasn't large enough for both my husband, me, and this cosleeper. My husband slept well, and so did our baby, but I was almost falling off the bed. Good quality product, but I was glad once our baby switched to sleeping in his pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I had missing items in my package! Package was extremely damaged and definitely wasn’t handle with care! I’m having a kid for crisis, and can’t depend on this to put my baby to sleep without the pieces! Looked like I had parts taking out and tapped over. Super disappointed and will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: Great amount of extra room as my son is very tall for only being 4 months. The downside is that this is not very comfortable for him as he's tossed and turned every night using this bed. I wish there was an incline wedge included in the top head portion of this as well to help better comfortability and support
customer_reviews.author: Pete Toal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for king sized bed
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this product, but unless you have a king sized bed or sleep by yourself with the baby in a queen sized bed, do not get it. It takes way too much space. That said, it is great to take with you if you are going to travel and need ya place for your baby to sleep. I am giving it three stars because it looks very comfortable, and I love that it plays music and has a light.
customer_reviews.author: R. Camp

customer_reviews.title: I wish I bought this months ago!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this when I son was born; this little sleeper is a back saver for new moms. After a few months of lifting and placing my baby in his bassinet, my lower back was in so much pain that I went to the doctor to make sure that I hadn't broken or fractured something. I bought this little sleeper to give my back a rest until my son started sleeping through the night. We also bring it on trips with us so we don't have to bring my son's huge baby bed with us. It has helped me tremendously and I'm very thankful that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. My baby sleeps so peacefully at night.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but baby won't sleep in it
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made and the vibration/music thing is a huge plus. It is also pretty large and folds up easily. But all that didn't help me because my baby will not sleep laying flat. He just cries. We have a moses basket with handles that we can swing him to sleep in, but this product has no possibility of rocking or swinging. If your baby sleeps laying flat, this could be a great product for you. I am giving mine away to a pregnant friend in the hopes that she will get some use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: natascha

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work as expected, specially on soft mattress or ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work as expected , specially on soft mattress or memory foam. Its not have hard surface at bottom , mattress is ok but not hard enough when placed
customer_reviews.author: RITESH C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but rather large
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but unfortunately too large to fit myself, my husband, and the infant sleeper in our queen size bed at night. I use it for napping during the day when there's just the two of us. I would recommend to couples with a king size bed or greater.
customer_reviews.author: MNA

customer_reviews.title: A necessity
customer_reviews.text: ...if your baby is sleeping in your bed. Please invest in this. It's a nice little bed and safe. Of course, our baby hated it in the beginning but they get used to it. It's just a logical thing to buy this and use it. The fabric is nice and sturdy and the little mattress is memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Elvisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Baby loves it too
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Baby loves it too. Whenever he cries or fusses a bit I can just reach in and comfort him. I can easily see him too which is a comfort.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I own a Serta iComfort, so when I saw they had a sleeper that could go along side me in the bed, I knew that that's what I wanted. Another added plus, this sleeper is longer than any of the other ones I've come across. Given that my first was 21.5 inches long, it makes this one my best option!!
customer_reviews.author: Clementine Humpkins

customer_reviews.title: This is a poor quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a poor quality product for the price. The mattress we received was uneven and very poor quality. We had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The padding was pretty comfortable for our newborn
customer_reviews.text: The padding was pretty comfortable for our newborn. It is pretty big, but fits fine with our king size bed. It's definitely too big if you're sleeping on a full size bed with two adults. I used a king size pillow case to protect the padding. Love the quality and the metal rim covered with super soft padding
customer_reviews.author: Ponnie

customer_reviews.title: Snug too much in a queen bed
customer_reviews.text: Too big in a queen bed and not as snug for the baby to feel contained. Maybe it's just our baby but he didn't like to sleep much in there plus husband didn't like how much it takes up space in a queen bed. Very snug and only works in a king I guess. Now it's just stored away and ready to be sold and maybe a waste of money based on our experience at least.
customer_reviews.author: TrollFoot

customer_reviews.title: Baby boy was just born SUNDAY! hE WEIGHED IN ...
customer_reviews.text: Baby boy was just born SUNDAY! hE WEIGHED IN AT 8LBS Mom will use it on her bed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amdpolen66azon Customerd

customer_reviews.title: The blue light is annoying. The music selection truncates at 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: It's okay... The blue light is annoying. The music selection truncates at 30 seconds, which is annoying and strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jing

customer_reviews.title: I'm not able to easily see my baby in this model
customer_reviews.text: I think the side mesh panels should be more transparent and a little lower. I'm not able to easily see my baby in this model. I got the SwaddleMe By Your Side Sleeper and it’s much better!
customer_reviews.author: KCam

customer_reviews.title: But nice and portable for travel
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy base. Not sure how safe this is for baby sleeping on your mattress in this sleeper. But nice and portable for travel, folds up nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SIDS scare
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like that when we got it there was a huge warning plastered on it saying babies have suffocated. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about sleep safety of this product...
customer_reviews.text: Really expected more from this product, but found it to be unsafe (in my opinion) and returned it. If my husband or I got too close to the item, our newborn would roll into that side of the sleeper. Yes, the sides are mesh, but I still did not feel this was safe. Very disappointed because I loved the idea of the baby being between us on the bed safely. Now he is in a bassinet next the bed. For the price, I would have liked to see better construction that did not allow the baby to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is way too big for a newborn. Baby won't sleep in it
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. My 5 month old daughter still sleeps in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. My 5 month old daughter still sleeps in it while in our bed, so we pretty much co-sleep with her while she's in it. Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants their baby close to them at nights but still being able to provide security for the baby to avoid getting rolled over on
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Brown

product_meta.title: Serta iComfort Infant Sleeper, Gray
product_meta.description:
Serta's icomfort Infant Sleeper gives you peace of mind and makes night time feedings easier by keeping baby safely by your side. The extra large design accommodates a growing baby. Built in night light, lullabies, and nature sound options help soothe baby back to sleep. The sturdy frame keep baby safe with no assembly needed. Fold easily with one hand, perfect for traveling or naps on the go.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
For any defective issues contact the manufacture customer care center at 1-855-422-2975.
feature_bullets: Extra large design, provides extra space to grow with baby
Electronics Module with Night Light, Lullabies and Nature Sounds
Sturdy frame design; No Consumer Assembly
One handed compact fold; great for travel
Mesh side panel design provides quick view of baby and good ventilation/air flow
Extra large design, provides extra space to grow with baby (34" x 17" x 8")
Electronics Module with Night Light, Lullabies and Nature Sounds
Sturdy frame design; No Consumer Assembly
One handed compact fold; great for travel
